definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Each plateau will also have a monorail system which will help move people laterally.
sentences.chinese: 每處高地都設單軌鐵路系統實現人們便捷的平面移動。

sentences.english: It was enough for the canal to act as an amplifier for every sound in his body.
sentences.chinese: 這已經足夠讓半規管作爲體內每處聲音的放大器了。

sentences.english: You see, every scar represents a person to whom I have given my love.
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，每處傷痕都代表一個我曾愛過的人。
